basic.origin: Mediterranean coastal areas, India, Tropical Americas
basic.blooming: Flowering and fruiting period year around
basic.color: Flower color white, red, fruit color black

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or special humus soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, avoid strong direct light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
